name: Ghoul N' Chick
description:
This platformer puzzle game is my very first finished project. I have just started learning Unity and it is very exciting to be able to release a mini game during a gamejam. 

Your mission is to help our gentle Ghoul to find his beloved Chick. They cant exist without one another. It will be a challenging experience, but very rewarding.

Please feel free to leave any sort of feedback, as I have just started my gamedev journey and it will be greatly appreciated.

Programming/Game Design by Kamyar Karimi

Artwork by Helia Golmohammadi

Music by Kamyar Karimi.

Free asset musics by Vertex Studio https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/absolutely-free-music-4883
